description: NetTime is a Simple Network Time Protocol (SNTP) client for Windows 95/98/Me/NT/2000/XP/Vista/7/8 and Server 2003/2008/2012. (32 bit and 64 bit operating systems are both supported) If you're looking for a program to keep your system time accurate, you've just found it!
summary: NetTime is a Simple Network Time Protocol (SNTP) client
author: Mark Griffiths
